text:
Is there a way to enable click to edit inline rich text or text module fields within a custom module?

I noticed that any HubSpot text modules dropped in a DnD area can be clicked to edit, but any text or rich text field in a custom module cannot be clicked in the previewer to edit.

I haven't found any documentation for this. Anyone have an idea how I can enable this?

Hey <@U03KAK3R4GY>, unfortunately that functionality is not yet supported, but the HubSpot product team is currently working on a solution for it! :slightly_smiling_face:

Would you have an interest in joining the *beta* when the time comes?
Hi <@UN0NUBU3S> – GREAT NEWS (this is a consistent picky complaint from clients). Beta --> Yes!
Hello, anyone knows how can i get info from current user authenticated?
Hey, can someone remind me what property keeps fields group open by default in `fields.json`?
